Texts.Chs: 如果没有^orange;萃取设备^reset;，那么你的研究将会进展缓慢。这种奇妙的设备可以把^green;无用的垃圾转换成有用的资源^reset;。请尝试把^orange;50份土块^reset;放入^orange;研磨机^reset;，然后耐心等待，因为它真的有些慢。
Texts.Eng: Without ^orange;Extractors^reset;, progression in FU will be ardurous. These wonderful devices ^green;take resource stacks and convert them into useful resources^reset;. Try it by placing ^orange;50 dirt inside^reset; a ^orange;Hand Mill^reset;. Be patient. They're slow.

Texts.Chs: 你可以把食物、种子、肉类还有许多乱七八糟的东西放进萃取设备中，你永远都想不到到底会有什么玩意儿冒出来！并且我还要提醒你，如果你升级到^orange;物质萃取器^reset;，那么萃取速度将会大幅提高噢。
Texts.Eng: You can also place food, seeds, meats and numerous other goods into extractors. ^green;Try everything you can^reset;. You never know what you'll discover! And before you whine about it: upgrade to an ^orange;Extraction Lab^reset; and you'll extract ^green;much^reset; faster.
